alert.note: Alert for Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 4:34PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Suffolk and northeastern Nassau Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 433 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Glen Cove, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Huntington Station, Glen Cove, Syosset, Huntington, Oyster Bay, Bayville, Centerport, Cold Spring Harbor, Brookville, Greenlawn, Elwood, East Hills, Sea Cliff, Glen Head and Glenwood Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern New York.
